review: I have postponed my treatment for tooth extraction and procedures just because of pain after 4 years of severe decayed tooth I came to Monica dental care after for extraction and dental bridge treatment, and about Monica she is such a sweet heart and so kind treatment was completely painless I never felt pain even after the treatment, she is so friendly she keeps talking to you to make you so comfortable, and the cost is too reasonable.she explains the procedure clearly so that we can make a good choice. Would recommend her to everyone .

review: Dr Monika is a very patient friendly ,helped with quick tooth pain relief.She is also very good in handling kids with tooth ailments.My granddaughter underwent root canal surgery under her treatment and recovered very soon. We strongly recommend her for any tooth ailments specially for her pediatric dental treatment. May God bless her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
Dr Monica is friendly, considerate, kind yet highly professional
She explains, discusses before laying out a detailed time bound treatment schedule
The procedure, cost, & medication helps you make an informed decision
She removed an old cap which had outlived its utility, identified a rotting tooth and suggested a couple of options
I chose bridging of two teeth 
She took an x-ray, showed me the extent of decay and infection before listing out the options which helped me take an informed decision
The temporary cap & medication before the next visit for recap and bridging, will help me deal with the infection & discomfort
After removing the cap, she inspected the adjacent teeth which is infected & rotting and needs RCT or bridging or both. 
The entire experience was painless( with LA of course) 
She has taken the tooth impressions and will call me to fix the next appointment
Recommended
reply_text: Thank u for ur valuable feedback sirüëç
